SmartFieldSpec.Name: Average Months Delinquent Smart Field
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_AVERAGEMONTHSDELINQUENT ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date select s.CONSTITUENTID, AVG(dbo.USR_UFN_CALCULATE_NTD_DELINQUENCY(CONVERT(Date,dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GET_NEXT_TRANSACTIONDATE_BY_SPONSORSHIPID(s.ID)))) as AvgMonthsDelinquent from dbo.SPONSORSHIP s group by s.CONSTITUENTID
